title: First Congress of the new government - actions

content.question: To make the new government viable, the first Congress of the United States did all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: organize a federal court system under the Supreme Court
draft a bill of rights and send it to the states for ratification
pass a tariff for the purpose of raising revenue
grant subsidies to encourage industrial development

content.answer: grant subsidies to encourage industrial development

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
